message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.RO, cs.SY

This paper discusses the issue of wireheading in artificial agents, which is a common problem in the field of artificial intelligence. The paper provides a taxonomy of ways by which wireheading can occur and experimentally demonstrates the results with a simulation platform. This work is relevant to the sub-fields of artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), computer security and cryptography (cs.CR), robotics (cs.RO), and systems and control (cs.SY).
